links.blocked: âŒ {{-author}}, your message was removed because it contained a link.

ban.name: ban
ban.user_option: The user to ban from the server
ban.reason_option: The reason for banning the user
ban.success: {{icon}} The specified user has been successfully banned and received a notification!
ban.success_no_notification: {{icon}} The user has been successfully banned, but has not received a notification!

clear.name: clear
clear.more_than_100: I cannot delete more than 100 messages at a time!
clear.less_than_1: I cannot delete less than 1 message!
clear.invalid_amount: Please specify a valid number between 1 and 100
clear.older_than_14d: You can only bulk delete messages that are under 14 days old.
clear.success: I have successfully deleted {{amount}} the messages
clear.error: There was an error trying to delete messages in this channel!

clearuser.name: clearuser
clearuser.invalid_args: Please specify a valid number between 1 and 100 or a user mention
clearuser.user_not_found: I cannot find the user you mentioned

kick.name: kick
kick.user_option: The user to kick from the server
kick.reason_option: The reason for kicking the user
kick.success: {{icon}} The specified user has been successfully kicked and received a notification!
kick.success_no_notification: {{icon}} The user has been successfully kicked, but has not received a notification!

mute.name: timeout
mute.description: Mute users for a certain time
mute.more_than_28d: Invalid input time or time is larger than 28 days

timeout.name: timeout
timeout.description: Timeout users for a certain time
timeout.success: {{icon}} The user has been successfully timed out!
